creditline: The Mercer Museum of the Bucks County Historical Society; Gift of Marshall Ridge, 1922
description: tan and brown striped wood with carving on forearm, neck and stock; brass trigger guard and rod holder; "A.D. Rothen Berg" engraved in top of barrel, some engraving on trigger plate
title: Bethlehem or Christian Springs, Pennsylvania, Flintlock Rifle (a.k.a. The Edward Marshall Rifle)
